p: The healing and medicinal benefits of cacao were appreciated by the ancient Mayan and Aztec civilizations. Such appreciation has currently increased, mainly for its anti-inflammatory, anti-allergenic, anti-carcinogenic, and antioxidant qualities. In the last decades, new properties, such as the ability to alleviate high blood pressure, and to control cholesterol, obesity, constipation, diabetes, bronchial asthma, chronic fatigue syndrome, and some neurodegenerative diseases have been discovered. It also helps improve cardiovascular health and emotional states, and exerts protective effects against neurotoxicity [ 90].
